title: Bowie 2.0, Leave Both Joe’s Alone!  5.27.20
itunes:title: Bowie 2.0, Leave Both Joe’s Alone!  5.27.20
description:
In episode 639, Jack and Miles are joined by Citizen Critic podcast co-host Scott Janovitz to discuss Joe Scarborough, George Floyd, the Labyrinth sequel, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. ‘Ugly Even for Him’: Trump’s Media Allies Recoil at His Smear of MSNBC Host
  2. Video shows Minneapolis cop with knee on neck of motionless, moaning man who later died
  3. Scott Derrickson Set To Direct ‘Labyrinth’ Sequel For TriStar Pictures; Maggie Levin To Write Script
  4. WATCH: Clutchy Hopkins - 2:15

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
